queries.sql: SELECT loan_table.created_at,loan_table.user_id,loan_table.loan_id,loan_table.code_country,loan_table.status, loan_table.amount ,users_table.name,users_table.surname FROM loan_table,users_table where loan_table.user_id = users_table.id order by loan_id desc
